replies.author: DreamVoid
replies.txt_content: 检查坐标25,78,-32位置的方块有无异常，或者用setblock变成air，可能是armourers_workshop（时装工坊）mod 的问题

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
尝试在config/forge.cfg文件中
修改这两项
B:removeErroringEntities=true
B:removeErroringTileEntities=true
